name: Produce Pay, Inc.
description: Developer of a financing and trading platform designed to facilitate a sustainable way to provide the agricultural industry with financial resources. The company's platforms provide farmers with immediate access to liquidity and financing in addition to real-time data for pricing transparency and connections to other key players in the field, enabling farmers to access custom-made cash flow services and expand their businesses.
one_liner: Developer of a financing and trading platform designed to facilitate a sustainable way to provide the agricultural industry with financial resources. The company's platforms provide farmers with immediate access to liquidity and financing in addition to real-time data for pricing transparency and connections to other key players in the field, enabling farmers to access custom-made cash flow services and expand their businesses.
